titles: The travels of Sir John Chardin into Persia and the East-Indies the first volume, containing the author's voyage from Paris to Ispahan : to which is added, The coronation of this present King of Persia, Solyman the Third.
author: Chardin, John, Sir, 1643-1713.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Published in English and French concurrently in 1686 as (pt. 1) of the Travels, but no more parts were issued.
